int bitsRequired (int numValues)

Detailed Description

Function Documentation

int bitsRequired ( int  numValues  ) 

This function returns the number of bits required to identify the input number of values.

It is ceil( log( numValues, 2 ) ). That is, the log base 2 of the input number rounded up.
